meanings.definition: A small European bird with a red breast.
meanings.sent1: The ruddocks chirped cheerfully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a ruddocks perched on the fence.

meanings.sent5: The gardener had to ruddocks carefully to avoid damaging the delicate roots.
